summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to employees of the Department of Parks and Recreation, Zoo Program; establishing an incentive program for eligible employees of the Department of Parks and Recreation, Zoo Program; authorizing an agreement with the Woodland Park Zoological Society ("Zoo Society") concerning the transfer of sick leave and vacation balances for departing zoo employees; providing for employee waivers of cash payments for accumulated and unused sick and vacation leave balances; amending SMC 4.36.120D to extend a temporary service credit purchase to participants of this incentive program; and authorizing and ratifying a memorandum of understanding between the City and the bargaining representatives of the employees of the Department of Parks and Recreation, Zoo Program.
